title: Social Media May Have to Embrace the Musk
sub_head: Elon Musk apparently won’t be joining Twitter’s board, but some of his ideas have a future in social media
body:
Social media might be moving beyond its historical underpinnings in ad dollars. The past week has given investors two very different illustrations of how that might play out.
To think of social media as strictly an advertising business is to appreciate only its outer candy shell. Future social-media investors will need to decide whether what lies inside can taste just as sweet.
